name: No Hunger Homeless
description:
THIS GAME RUNS IN FULL-SCREEN MODE
....
A homeless man has woken up on the strange island.
The only thing he feels is hunger.
The only thing he wants is to eat.
He must survive...

-----------------------------------------------------------------
Game Design - chobitsGX (celes)

Sound Design & Music - Rostislav Goncharov

Environment Design - MissDucktato ( Rebe)
